title: AGIBOT launches Genie Sim 3.0 robot simulation platform
description:
Genie Sim 3.0 draws from more than 10,000 hours of synthetic dataset, including real-world robot operation scenarios.

The post AGIBOT launches Genie Sim 3.0 robot simulation platform appeared first on The Robot Report.
